A powerful Python library for working with Apache Avro schemas, providing seamless integration with data serialization and schema management. Perfect for data engineering pipelines and stream processing applications.

## âœ¨ Features

- ğŸ—ï¸ **Schema-First Development** - Generate Python classes directly from Avro schemas
- ğŸ”„ **Full Type Support** - Complete support for all Avro logical types
- ğŸ› ï¸ **Custom Serialization** - Flexible serializers and deserializers
- ğŸŒ **Schema Registry Integration** - Native support for Confluent Schema Registry
- ğŸ”’ **Type Safety** - Full static type checking support
- âš¡ **High Performance** - Optimized for production workloads

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

### Install from PyPI

```bash
pip install avro-dbo
```

### Install from source

**UV is required to build and publish the package.**

#### Install UV package manager: https://github.com/astral-sh/uv

```bash
curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh
```

#### Build and publish the package

```bash
uv sync --upgrade
uv build
```
